description: Turning Point Action has launched a new website for students who want to say #HillNO to a Hillary Clinton presidency.
title: Millennials Say #HILLNO to Hillary
text:
Turning Point Action has launched a new website for students who want to say #HillNO to a Hillary Clinton presidency.
“Help us fight back on every college campus in America,” the new website states.
Turning Point Action is a sister organization of Turning Point USA (TPUSA) which was founded in 2012 by Charlie Kirk, the group’s executive director. The mission of TPUSA is to educate students about free markets and limited government. According to its website, TPUSA has “presence on over 800 college campuses nationwide” and is the “fastest growing youth movement in America.”
The group, which is known for its posters carrying the slogan, “Big Government Sucks,” prides itself on its face-to-face contacts and grassroots connections.
“In the Spring, we anticipate to connect and directly reach over 24,000 students A DAY!” Kirk told TPUSA members in a letter recently.
